name: TRPD
description:
In the unexplored depths, the only things that matter are you and your faithful sonar. 
_______________________

The goal of the game is to survive an attack from numerous enemies. The player can scan the surroundings with the sonar or launch a swarm of deadly torpedoes. Both actions consume energy of the player's craft and only one action can be executed at a time.

_______________________

PRESS X to SCAN - the enlarging circle indicates the scanning's range.

PRESS Z to FIRE - the expanding arch represents the reach of the torpedoes.

PRESS <- AND -> to ROTATE THE CRAFT

_______________________

The game was made during Slavic Game Jam 2017. 

_______________________

At this moment, game must be played at 1920x1080 resolution.
